participant_1.background:
I treasure my ability to swim.
i like baking.
I remember feeling safe and loved in my childhood home.
I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym.
my job involves building drones.

participant_2.background:
Rita Hayworth is my idol and I like to work out to stay in shape.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
my favorite genre of music is rock.
I like to play pretend with my daughter.
i recently had knee surgery.

content.text: It's a beautiful day outside, how are you doing today?
Hi! I am doing well. I am a bit sore from knee surgery but I am recovering well!
Oh no, that sounds painful! I hope you have a speedy recovery.
Thank you! I am trying to stay active but I have to be careful.
Well that's good. I'm glad to hear you are on the mend.
Thanks! I am trying to stay positive and active.
It sounds like you are on the right track. I am sure you will be back to 100% in no time.
I hope so! I am excited to get back to my normal routine.
I bet you are! What are some of your favorite activities?
I enjoy working out, baking, and spending time with my family.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to bake too. What is your favorite thing to bake?
I love to bake cookies. I have a lot of fun experimenting with different recipes.
That sounds fun! I love to try new recipes too.
Me too! It's a great way to learn new things and make delicious treats.
I agree! I love trying new things in the kitchen
